    Featured article - Main Title

    Turn IoT insights into action

    Iot Insights intro - HTML

    While an IoT platform can generate a lot of insight, you don’t improve your organization’s efficiency, increase customer satisfaction, or open a new business opportunity without applying it. Valuable business benefits like these require that something or someone actually does something – that is, trigger an action or take one. Action is the whole point of the IoT. It’s also the hardest part because it involves asking people to change.

    To ensure you’re gaining the most value out of your IoT deployment, you’ll need to put change management in your roadmap, ensure collaboration is a major part of the process, and remember that actions demand not just tech transformation, but business transformation.

    Start Transforming 

    Featured solution - LC

    _Featured Solution

    Hacking is a serious and costly problem in Industrial Internet of Things (IIoT). It is therefore crucial to make data transfer and storage absolutely secure. The Trusted Platform Module (TPM) Security Peripheral Module (Pmod) for Xilinx Zynq®-7000 All Programmable SoCs provides a cost-effective and production-ready solution. Enabling a root of trust for platform integrity, remote attestation, and cryptographic services, TPM Pmod offers the security foundation for IIoT that developers are looking for.

    Featuring Infineon’s OPTIGATM TPM SLB9670 which is compliant to the Trusted Computing Group (TCG) TPM 1.2 specification, this TPM Pmod connects to Xilinx Zynq device via a SPI interface.


    Read more
